#summary Howto get started with grailsMDA.

= Get started =

 # Download the latest version of *grailsMDA.jar* from http://code.google.com/p/grailsmda/downloads/list
 # Download the latest version of *build.xml* from http://code.google.com/p/grailsmda/downloads/list
 # Modify the *genpath*, *modelpath* and *grailsMDA* properties in the *build.xml*
   * Notice that *genpath* should bepointing to your grails project root folder 
 # Run the "clean-build" task
 # Look into your *genpath* for generated grails domain classes
